Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Gen ai has made feedback far more readily available than waiting for a teacher to respond to an email or wait for the next class to receive feedback

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I tend to use gen ai as an easily accessible source when assessing my work, however I always trust teacher feedback far more and view feedback from my teachers to be far more qualitative and comprehensive

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teacher feedback is usually more tailored around the specific assessment task whilst feedback provided by generative ai tends to be more focused on the broader topic as ai models typically donâ€™t have access to the specific course content of a class and instead go off all the topic pertaining to the task available on the internet
